content:
Hello,
Is there a test server available for CARIN BB. If so, can you please share the base URL for the same?

Thank You.

Sure, we have a reference implementation.
Server root: http://cpcds-ri.org/cpcds-server/fhir/
UI: http://cpcds-ri.org/cpcds-server
See auth info here: https://github.com/carin-alliance/cpcds-server-ri/wiki/Authorization
Client Reg: https://github.com/carin-alliance/cpcds-server-ri/wiki/Client-Registration
Patient1 has sample data.
@Corey Spears thank you so much
